mapper.sql: cronid, available, admin_set, name, filename, lastrun, nextrun, weekday, day, hour, minute
mapper.delete: delete from qs_crons where cronid in (#{ids})
mapper.insert: insert into qs_crons (cronid, available, admin_set, name, filename, lastrun, nextrun, weekday, day, hour, minute) values (#{cronid,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{available,jdbcType=BIT}, #{adminSet,jdbcType=BIT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastrun,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{nextrun,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{weekday,jdbcType=BIT}, #{day,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{hour,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{minute,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

cronid,
available,
admin_set,
name,
filename,
lastrun,

mapper.update:
update qs_crons
available = #{available,jdbcType=BIT},
admin_set = #{adminSet,jdbcType=BIT},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
filename = #{filename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lastrun = #{lastrun,jdbcType=INTEGER},
nextrun = #{nextrun,jdbcType=INTEGER},
weekday = #{weekday,jdbcType=BIT},
day = #{day,jdbcType=TINYINT},
hour = #{hour,jdbcType=TINYINT},
minute = #{minute,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where cronid = #{cronid,jdbcType=SMALLINT}

update qs_crons set available = #{available,jdbcType=BIT}, admin_set = #{adminSet,jdbcType=BIT}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, filename = #{filename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lastrun = #{lastrun,jdbcType=INTEGER}, nextrun = #{nextrun,jdbcType=INTEGER}, weekday = #{weekday,jdbcType=BIT}, day = #{day,jdbcType=TINYINT}, hour = #{hour,jdbcType=TINYINT}, minute = #{minute,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where cronid = #{cronid,jdbcType=SMALLINT}
